attributes.action: Legalise equal access to and treatment for women / girls at all sport provision
attributes.additional_details: Currently women / girls are denied access to sports across the UK. They receive lesser benefits, lesser renumeration than their male counterparts. This is unfair, unjust and as shown by the Lionesses, unjustifiable.
attributes.background:
Provide women /girls with access to all sport provision in the UK including educational settings.

Provide women / girls with equal benefits and renumeration in sport settings as provided to males fulfilling the same role.

rejection.details:
The Government and Parliament are not responsible for opportunities to play sport outside of school, as this is a matter for relevant sporting bodies and organisations. Similarly, decisions about pay and other benefits for professional sportspersons are a matter for their employers, not the Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign: 

Require schools offer all sports the school offers to children of any sex: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621227
